title: Positive Ways to Deal with Negative or Unwanted Opinions
description:
So, what should you do when Great Aunt Carol randomly asks why you haven’t had kids yet? Or when long lost cousin Tony makes a remark about the fact that you’re still living with your parents at age 24?

How do you deal with questions that seemingly impose unwanted opinions on you? How do you respond confidently, respectfully, and firmly?

Tune into this episode to learn gives three tips to help when you‘re inevitably faced with an awkward situation like this so you can respond effectively rather than react emotionally.
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
